Harpy.name: Salamander
Harpy.description: A fiery lizard demi, her mane like mass of hair is a lurid almost unnatural orange and spills to her mid back. The rest of her athletic body is a mix of middling reddish tan on her skin combined with a deep crimson on her scales that cover her flanks, back and much of her limbs. On the subject of limbs her legs are markedly toned rising to shapely thighs and a muscular posterior. In a similar vein her tail appears unusually long, thicker at the base than that of similar breeds of humanoid and in possession of a non uniform taper for a heftier overral look to it.
